translations: 通讯系统状态分析（Performance Analysis of Telecommunication Systems）；优先活性追踪系统（priority activity tracking system）

sentences.translation: 她轻轻地拍了拍自己的皮肤。

sentences.sentence: He says hello. He pats my head. Woof!
sentences.translation: 他会说你好，他会轻拍的我头。汪！

sentences.sentence: When it cried, she rocked it back and forth and gave it little comforting pats.
sentences.translation: 当它哭的时候，她会前后摇动，轻拍安抚它。
